forum.content:
Current, I want to gather some partners to practice English because I found that my English usage is getting lower gradually during the summer vacation. As a result, I need some volunteers to be the group member that can share some stories or news with each other.
By the way. I need to create a group and in the group, English is the only acceptable language.

Leave your comment below and think about how to make it work!!!!
forum.title: Let's learn English
